com.scs.stevetech1.weapons

Class HitscanRifle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scs.stevetech1.entities.Entity
      • com.scs.stevetech1.shared.AbstractAbility
        • com.scs.stevetech1.weapons.AbstractMagazineGun
          • com.scs.stevetech1.weapons.HitscanRifle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, ICausesHarmOnContact, IEntity, IHitscanWeapon, IProcessByClient, IProcessByServer, IReloadable, IAbility

    public class HitscanRifle
extends AbstractMagazineGun
implements IHitscanWeapon, ICausesHarmOnContact
    This is a weapon that doesn't fire projectiles, it uses hitscan.
    Author:
    stephencs
